titles.title: A resolution urging the Polish Government to recognize the independent trade union Solidarity as a legal entity.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

calendar.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported to Senate by Senator Pell without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1004.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/20/1988--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Polish Government should: (1) recognize the contribution to the economic and social reconstruction of the country to be made by Poles acting through independent, voluntary organizations; and (2) confer legal and independent status upon the trade union Solidarity.
